Name: My First Music Workshop
About the game: My First Music Workshop is a unique music workshop simulator game where you need to fix musical instruments. Once you fix the instrument, you can collect your payment. Game Features: * jobs related to repairing musical instruments * jobs related to used gear that can be resold * list of repairs that needs to be done to collect your payment
